evidence.claim: Surgical Solutions uses AWS to host its applications and manage services.
The company utilizes FHIR for health data exchange in its systems.
Surgical Solutions supports X12 transaction sets for billing and insurance processing.
The integration patterns include microservices architectures for system scalability.
Use of HL7 standards acknowledged for interoperability in electronic health records.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in healthcare data exchange, uses X12 standards, and values API automation.
